<br>
Burglaries over the last 12 months are <h8>`r ifelse(burglaries_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0," up"," down")` `r ifelse(burglaries_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0,burglaries_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,substring(burglaries_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,2))`%</h8> compared to the annual average over the last three years, according to the latest Los Angeles Police Department data through `r format(lapd_asofdate, "%B %d")`.

The city averaged <h8>`r round(burglaries_city$last12mos/52,0)`</h8> burglaries a week over the last 12 months. In 2019, that number was <h8>`r round(burglaries_city$'2019'/52,0)`</h8> a week.

Police generally define burglary as someone illegally entering a home, business or vehicle to steal something of value or commit some other felony.

<subhead>A closer look at Los Angeles burglaries neighborhood by neighborhood</subhead>

The risk is not the same neighborhood to neighborhood. ABC7's data team looked at data from the Los Angeles Police Department by neighborhood from 2019 through `r format(lapd_asofdate, "%B %d, %Y")`, the latest date for which records are available.

The map color codes each area by the burglary rate over the last 12 months. The three darker blues represent areas with burglary rates that are higher than the citywide rate. You can also click the box in the bottom right corner to see neighborhoods by the number of burglaries.

Click on any area to see detailed numbers or the buttons at the bottom of the map to switch between numbers and rates. 

You can find your neighborhood by using the box at the top of the map to search for any street, place, landmark or zip code to zoom to that location or search the table below the map to view and compare data by area over more than a decade.

```{r cars, echo=FALSE,out.width='100%',out.height='750'}
# burglary MAP

# Set bins for numbers of crimes for burglaries map
burglarybins1 <- c(0,
                1000,
                2500,
                4000,
                6000,
                7500)
burglarybins2 <- c(0,
                   500,
                1000,
                2000,
                3000,
                4000)
burglarypal1 <- colorBin(c("#aecfe6",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), burglaries_district$rate_last12, bins = burglarybins1,na.color = "#51585f")

burglarypal2 <- colorBin(c("#aecfe6",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), burglaries_district$last12mos, bins = burglarybins2,na.color = "#51585f")


# Create quick labels for burglaries map
burglarylabel <- paste(sep="",
                     "<popuptitle>",
                     burglaries_district$last12mos,
                     " burglaries </popuptitle><br>",
                     " in the last 12 months in the <b>",
                     burglaries_district$district,
                     "</b>area, home to an estimated ",
                     prettyNum(burglaries_district$population, big.mark=","),
                     " people.
<br>
<table>      
      <tr>
				<th></th>
				<th>Total</th>
				<th>Rate</th>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td>2019</td>
				<td>",
burglaries_district$`2019`,
"</td>
				<td>",
round(burglaries_district$rate19,0),
"</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td>2020</td>
				<td>",
burglaries_district$`2020`,
"</td>
				<td>",
round(burglaries_district$rate20,0),
"</td>
			</tr>
						<tr>
				<td>2021</td>
				<td>",
burglaries_district$`2021`,
"</td>
				<td>",
round(burglaries_district$rate21,0),
"</td>
			</tr>
						<tr>
				<td>Last 12 months</td>
				<td>",
burglaries_district$last12mos,
"</td>
				<td>",
round(burglaries_district$rate_last12,0),
"</td>
			</tr>
						<tr>
				<td>3-year Average</td>
				<td>",
round(burglaries_district$avg_prior3years,0),
"</td>
				<td>",
round(burglaries_district$rate_prior3years,0),
"</td>
			</tr>
</table>")

# Creating police beats map for types of crimes
losangeles_burglary_map <- leaflet(burglaries_district, options = leafletOptions(zoomControl = FALSE, zoomSnap = 0.5, zoomDelta=0.5)) %>%
  htmlwidgets::onRender("function(el, x) {
L.control.zoom({ position: 'topright' }).addTo(this)
}") %>%
  setView(-118.24, 34.05, zoom = 11) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(provider = "Esri.WorldImagery") %>%
  addProviderTiles(provider = "CartoDB.PositronOnlyLabels") %>%
  addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = burglarylabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~burglarypal1(rate_last12),
              group="Rate") %>% 
    addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = burglarylabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~burglarypal2(last12mos),
              group="Number") %>% 
    addSearchOSM(options = searchOptions(autoCollapse=FALSE, minLength = 3,zoom=13, position="topleft")) %>%
    onRender("function(el, x) {
        $('input.search-input')[0].placeholder = 'Search street, place or zip code'
        }") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = burglaries_district$rate_last12, 
            pal = burglarypal1,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Burglary Rate<br><popupchatter>Burglaries/100K people<br>Citywide: ",prettyNum(round(burglaries_city$rate_last12,0), big.mark=",")),
            group = "Rate",
            className = "info legend Rate") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = burglaries_district$last12mos, 
            pal = burglarypal2,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Burglaries<br><popupchatter>Total burglaries<br>Citywide: ",prettyNum(round(burglaries_city$last12mos,0), big.mark=",")),
            group = "Number",
            className = "info legend Number") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Rate","Number"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE),
    position = 'bottomright') %>% hideGroup(c("Number")) %>%
   htmlwidgets::onRender("
      function(el, x) {
         var updateLegend = function () {
            var selectedGroup = document.querySelectorAll('input:checked')[0].nextSibling.innerText.substr(1);

            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(a => a.hidden=true);
            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(l => {
               if (l.classList.contains(selectedGroup)) l.hidden=false;
            });
         };
         updateLegend();
         this.on('baselayerchange', el => updateLegend());
      }"
   )
losangeles_burglary_map
```
